access_viewer.label: Access Viewer
access_viewer.description: Can list and view users, roles, and permission sets

access_writer.label: Access Writer
access_writer.description: Can create, update, and manage users, roles, and permission sets, including assigning or revoking roles

accounting_viewer.label: Accounting Viewer
accounting_viewer.description: Can view accounting reports, journal entries, ledger accounts, and transactions

accounting_writer.label: Accounting Writer
accounting_writer.description: Can create and manage charts of accounts, ledger and manual transactions, balance sheets, profit-and-loss reports, and related accounting data

audit_viewer.label: Audit Viewer
audit_viewer.description: Can view audit logs and system activity records

contract_creation.label: Contract Creation
contract_creation.description: Can generate and manage loan agreements and contract documents

credit_viewer.label: Credit Viewer
credit_viewer.description: Can view credit facilities, disbursals, obligations, and related loan information

credit_writer.label: Credit Writer
credit_writer.description: Can create and manage credit facilities, update collateral, initiate and settle disbursals, record interest, and process obligations

credit_payment_date.label: Dated Payment Creation
credit_payment_date.description: Can create payments for credit facilities with custom effective dates

customer_viewer.label: Customer Viewer
customer_viewer.description: Can view customer profiles and account details

customer_writer.label: Customer Writer
customer_writer.description: Can create, update, and manage customers, including initiating and approving KYC processes

dashboard_viewer.label: Dashboard Viewer
dashboard_viewer.description: Can view system dashboards and analytics

deposit_viewer.label: Deposit Viewer
deposit_viewer.description: Can view deposit accounts, balances, transaction history, and withdrawal details

deposit_writer.label: Deposit Writer
deposit_writer.description: Can create and manage deposits, deposit accounts, and withdrawals, including initiating, confirming, cancelling, and approving withdrawals

governance_viewer.label: Governance Viewer
governance_viewer.description: Can view governance committees, policies, and approval processes

governance_writer.label: Governance Writer
governance_writer.description: Can create and manage committees and policies, and control approval processes (create, approve, deny, conclude)

custody_writer.label: Custody Writer
custody_writer.description: Can create and manage custodian configurations

report_viewer.label: Report Viewer
report_viewer.description: Can see regulatory reports and download them

report_writer.label: Report Writer
report_writer.description: Can trigger generation of regulatory reports
